revised_title: Correction to Prof. Cayley: Dynamo-Magneto-Electric Machines and Related Developments
tldr: This article corrects a previous paper by Prof. Cayley on the topic of dynamo-magneto-electric machines. It discusses the development of these machines by Siemens and Wheatstone, and the author's own machine design. The article also highlights the importance of external work and the use of platinum wires in the circuit to improve the machine's efficiency.
